quote2.quote: What I need most of all is color, always, always
quote2.author: Claude Monet

quote4.quote: Art is either revolution or plagiarism
quote4.author: Paul Gauguin

quote5.quote: The great artist is the simplifier
quote5.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote6.quote: To draw you must close your eyes and sing
quote6.author: Pablo Picasso

quote7.quote: Art is meant to disturb, science reassures
quote7.author: Georges Braque

quote8.quote: Every act of creation is first an act of destruction
quote8.author: Pablo Picasso

quote9.quote: Tell your own story, and you will be interesting
quote9.author: Louise Bourgeois

quote10.quote: Without atmosphere a painting is nothing
quote10.author: Rembrandt

quote11.quote: Everything that is contradictory creates life
quote11.author: Salvador Dalí

quote12.quote: No great work of art is ever finished
quote12.author: Michelangelo

quote13.quote: To be an artist, you need to exist in a world of silence
quote13.author: Louise Bourgeois

quote14.quote: Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist
quote14.author: René Magritte

quote15.quote: A work is finished when an artist realizes his intentions
quote15.author: Rembrandt

quote16.quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned
quote16.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote17.quote: Bad artists copy. Good artists steal
quote17.author: Pablo Picasso

quote18.quote: Everything you can imagine is real
quote18.author: Pablo Picasso

quote19.quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream
quote19.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote20.quote: Art is my life and my life is art
quote20.author: Yoko Ono

quote21.quote: Art is a way of recognizing oneself
quote21.author: Louise Bourgeois

quote22.quote: You study, you learn, but you guard the original naivete
quote22.author: Henri Matisse

quote23.quote: Art lives from constraints and dies from freedom
quote23.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote24.quote: Sometimes with art, it is important just to look
quote24.author: Marina Abramović

quote25.quote: Every good painter paints what he is
quote25.author: Jackson Pollock

quote26.quote: To be an artist is to believe in life
quote26.author: Henry Moore

quote27.quote: Art is a lie that makes us realize truth
quote27.author: Pablo Picasso

quote28.quote: Art is a line around your thoughts
quote28.author: Gustav Klimt

quote30.quote: Great art picks up where nature ends
quote30.author: Marc Chagall

quote31.quote: AIt is absurd to look for perfection
quote31.author: Camille Pissarro

quote32.quote: Knowing how to look is a way of inventing
quote32.author: Salvador Dalí

quote34.quote: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working
quote34.author: Pablo Picasso

quote35.quote: I would like to paint the way a bird sings
quote35.author: Claude Monet

quote36.quote: If I could say it in words there would be no reason to paint
quote36.author: Edward Hopper

quote37.quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see
quote37.author: Edgar Degas

quote38.quote: Color is a power which directly influences the soul
quote38.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quote39.quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment
quote39.author: Claude Monet

quote39.quote: CI never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality
quote39.author: Frida Kahlo
